Text:
Cid practices his swordsmanship in the forest at
night under the guidance of the Victorious Golden
Dragon, Goldy Gilded.

While you're still nowhere near matching my level,
you seem to be making progress day by day, Cindler.

Thank you, Master Goldy. By the way, it's Cid,
not Cindler.
Oh, right. Almost got it.
(He wasn't anywhere close to getting it... Huh?)

You've persevered through my tough training.
The day may soon come when...
Master Goldy, did you sense something just now?

Sense something? Can't say I did. But then again,
we are in the forest at night.

There could be animals watching us. But since I still
haven't trained you in sensing presences, it's likely
just in your head.
I see...

Just as Cid is about to be convinced, there is the
soft sound of footsteps.
Hm?
...Goldy Gilded, I presume.

From the dark forest emerges a young girl who appears
to be the leader of the organization that imprisoned
Cid.
I'll spare you this once. Leave him and disappear.

Hmph... Quite the bold words, young lady. It appears
you only know my name and nothing of my reputation.

Master Goldy! This girl is a member of that evil
organization!

What? This young lady? Hmmm... Based on her delicate
build and the fact she's recklessly showed up unarmed,
I'd say her Battle Power is around 45.
Alright, Cidney, consider this hands-on training.
Huh?

You've weathered intense training. Now it's time to
experience an actual fight.

If you take out those pursuing you, it solves all of
your problems. I take it you've prepared a nickname
and a Special Technique to break free from this life
in hiding?

Y-Yes! I'll give it my all! And for the record,
it's not Cidney.

With that said, Cid turns his back to Goldy and
confronts the girl from the "evil organization."

I am Cid, Shadow of the Ebony Darkness! Student of
the Victorious Golden Dragon, Goldy Gilded!
...You plan on fighting me?
I want to be free! And for that...I'll fight!

Cid swings his training sword in a wide arc. She
leaps back to avoid the strike, a pained expression
on her face.
Ack...!

(Is she flinching? I might have a chance at winning
this!)
Come on, just leave me alone!
I can't do that...!
Then...you leave me no choice but to take you down!

Cid's aggressive swordsmanship appears to give him
the upper hand. She counters with a sword she calls
forth, but she's clearly on the defensive.
Not good. At this rate
W-Wait!

Chase her, Cinclair. If she escapes too deep into the
forest, tracking her down will be tough.
Yes, sir!

Cid chases after the girl's silhouette as she flees
deeper into the dark forest.

Urgh...! You may have lost your memories, but your
sword skills remain intact.

I have no idea what you're talking about. I owe my
sword skills to Master Goldy!

I'll show you! Demonic Golden Dragon! Fatality
Strike!

The flow of golden energy coalesces into an image of
a glimmering dragon. Beyond the dragon stands the girl,
her expression one of frustration.
(I can end this with my Special Technique. But...)

(There's something off about this. It just doesn't
suit me, or...I don't know, just doesn't feel right...)
...This isn't like you!

Perhaps sharing her thoughts, Cid hesitates just as
he's about to unleash his Special Technique.
Wh-What...?

The Cid I know doesn't go around boasting. You lurk
in the darkness and hunt down shadows... That's who
you are!

Also...you don't wield your sword just for yourself.
You fight for the sake of the world!
You are our Shadowbroker! Remember...your name!
M-My name is...

(...Do I have a name besides "Cid"? Shadowbroker...
Something about that feels familiar.)

(...Yeah, it sounds kinda cool! Simple, but as a
nickname, it's way better than "Shadow of the
Ebony Darkness"!)

(Heh... I bet it'll sound even cooler if added a
title. Let's see... Master...)
...Shadow.
N-Nghh...?!

At that moment, a flurry of scenes flash through
Cid's mind. Among these memories is her face.
...What did you say your name was just now...?

(That's right, I chose to erase my memories back
then. The specifics are hazy...but it definitely
feels like I gained some valuable experiences.)

Looks like I caused you quite a bit of trouble,
Alpha.
The aura around Cid shifts...
That's all over now.
Cid... No, Shadow. I'm glad you're back.

Let's go home to where we belongto the Shadow
Garden.
Wait.

As Shadow turns his gaze to the dark forest,
a golden, glittering figure approaches.

Huh? You're the young lady from earlier, and...who
might you be? Cinclair doesn't seem to be with you
two... Hmm.

Judging by the situation, he lost and was abducted...
As his master, I can't let this slide!
(Who's this sparkly chad again...?)
Moi, Goldy Gilded, will settle this score myself!

Just so you're aware, my Battle Power is 4,300! I'm
about to add another notch to my streak of being
undefeated! Haha... Don't say I didn't warn you!

(He's spilling the beans on all his secrets...
Typical side character move!)

(I'd love to play along, but he doesn't seem very
level-headed. Probably best to stop him here.)

In order to calm down the dazzling Goldy seeking
vengeance for his student, Shadow and Alpha
confront him face to face.
